mapper.select: SELECT A.intAID, A.strSubject, I.strDescription, I.strAddr1, I.strAddr2, I.strZipCode, I.strPhone, I.intRoomCnt, I.strCheckIn, I.strCheckOut, A.strType, I.intGrade, I.decLat, I.decLon FROM ACCOMM A with(nolock) INNER JOIN ACCOMM_INFO I with(nolock) ON A.intAID = I.intAID WHERE A.intAID = #{accommID}
